author: Westboy31
description:
How to use:
 * Create a new layer on top of all other layers
 * Create shape-painter object and place it on the top layer
 * Assign this behavior to the shape-painter object
 * Use one of the "Start transition..." actions

Transition actions:
  * Fade to color:  Solid color that fades in or out.
  * Vertical wipe:  Solid color that comes from left or right side then moves back.
  * Horizontal wipe: Solid color that comes from top or bottom side then moves back.
  * Circle wipe:  Solid colored circle starts in center and grows to cover entire screen then shrinks to center (1 to 5 circles)
  * Rectangle wipe: Solid colored rectangle starts in center and grows to cover entire screen then shrinks to center (1 to 5 circles)
  * Star wipe: Solid colored star starts in center and grows to cover entire screen then shrinks to center (3 or more points)
  * Vertical split: Solid colors come from top and bottom and meet in center, then return.
  * Horizontal split: Solid colors come from left and right and meet in center, then return.
  * Four-way split: Solid colors come from each corner and meet in center, then return.

Conditions:
 * Transition ended:  Detects when a transition has completed

Tips:
 * Each action can be run "Forward" (end of scene), "Backward" (start of scene), or "Both" (visual effect) 
 * Use condition "Transistion ended" to signal when the transition is complete
 * Use two shape-painters to enable transitions at the beginning and end of a scene
 * For multiple simultaneous transitions, use multiple shape-painter objects
 * Do not move the camera of the transition layer
name: FlashTransitionPainter
shortDescription: Draw an animated transition (with a shape painter object) that is useful when changing scenes.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Draw an animated transition that is useful when changing scenes.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: FlashTransitionPainter

events.comment: Disable effect when the game starts.
Avoid default parameter of painter that could make the extension doesn't work.

Initialize position of painter. 
Increment or decrement "_TimeProgressionEffect" depending on direction.

Here this the paints functions of different effect depending on the type chosen by the user.
Detect the direction of the animation and its end.
Type 1 : Fade to color
Type 2 : screen come from top then return.
Type 3 : screen come from left then return.
Vertical split
Horizontal split
Top-left rectangle
Top-right rectangle
Bottom-left rectangle
Bottom-right
Use 370 degrees to make it look like it closed fully
The repeat 5 times is used to have clean and smooth edges , especially for circle.
Reset variables.

eventsFunctions.description: Start "Clock wipe" transition animation that starts with vertical line and grows as the line rotates around the center.
eventsFunctions.name: ClockWipe
eventsFunctions.sentence: Start "Clock" transition using _PARAM0_ spinnning _PARAM5_ with direction _PARAM4_ and color _PARAM2_ that takes _PARAM3_ seconds

events.comment:
Initialise all variables and then activate the behavior.
If user doesn't assign value to color we take the last value registred.
If user doesn't assign value to timer we take a default value (0.5).
Set transition type
